checklist: Described your design and fabrication process using words/images/screenshots.
Explained the programming process/es you used and how the microcontroller datasheet helped you.
Outlined problems and how you fixed them
Included original design files and code
Measured the power consumption of an output device
tasks.description: Add an output device to a microcontroller board you've designed and program it to do something
tasks.name: Output Devices
outcomes: Demonstrate workflows used in circuit board design and fabrication
